sentence.Network_en: Annette's performance as Eliza Doolittle in "Pygmalion" was truly memorable.

sentence.Network_en: Based on George Bernard Shaw's 1913 play Pygmalion, the film swept the Academy Awards.
sentence.Network_cn: 该片以萧伯纳1913年的剧作《皮格马利翁》为蓝本, 夺得了多项奥斯卡奖.

list.abs: on pygmalion effect in college english teaching ., 皮格马利翁效应与大学英语教学.
皮格马利翁效应(Pygmalion Effect,另译为毕马龙效应,或比马龙效应),罗森塔尔效应,或“期待效应”,是指人(通常是指孩童或学生)在被付予更高期望以后,他们会.

means.word_mean: 1. (Greek mythology) a king who created a statue of a woman and fell in love with it; Aphrodite brought the sculpture to life as Galatea
